content: a unique asymmetrical shawlette that can be styled as a scarf or shawl best of all it takes only 100 grams of yarn flexible to any yardage this shawl is a great option to use for your one hank of hand dyed or luxury yarn the subtle texture and simplicity are perfect for bold colorways of varigated speckled and tonal yarns and it s easy enough for a beginner supplies needed - size i crochet hook - 100 grams of yarn - yarn needle and scissors still not sure what to do with your single skein of hand dyed yarn see my store for more patterns
